title: StopPay
desc: Step-by-step guides and direct links to cancel subscriptions

seo_text:
How to quickly cancel subscriptions and stop recurring charges?

StopPay is a free directory designed to help you cancel subscriptions for popular US and global services. We‚Äôve gathered direct links and step-by-step instructions so you can disable auto-renewal and stop unwanted charges on your credit card.

Our service never requires access to your financial or personal data. We simply show you the way: how to unbind your card, where to find the 'unsubscribe' button, and how to stop paying for services you no longer use.
